title: LF Jg/Mid for clash (Bot lane is G4)
body:
Need a competent Jungle and or Mid that can play at a Mid Silver/Low Gold level, with decent game knowledge and communication skills. A large champion pool would be a nice little bonus too. 

Must have mics and be available for at least 2 games a day up til the first clash, after that, we'll see what we need to do. Planning to keep the same five together so we can grow and improve together.

My highest is G4 this season but currently S5 thanks to playing with not-so-great friends. Ign: Leagues Legend

replies.body: ex Diamond 4 Mid main now silver 3 with a gold 3 flex account I can show you, am really looking forward to hopefully join, I play all champs except some newer ones like zoe, TheRealADC is my other account

G4 solo/duo Jungle interested in seeing if your team is a fit for me. Unfortunately am pretty much a 1 trick Zac main right now aiming to diversify champion pool specifically for clash though have had success with Vi, Graves, Jax. Feel free to look me up first add me and chat a bit Shepherd 0f Fire. (In the 0f part of my name the 0 is a zero).
